verses.verse: And when the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> was <S%G1230>past,<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the mother of <S%G2385>James,<s%> and <S%G4539>Salome,<s%> had <S%G59>bought<s%> sweet <S%G759>spices,<s%> that they might <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G218>anoint<s%> him.

And <S%G3029>very<s%> <S%G260>early<s%> <S%G4404><s%> in the morning the <S%G3391>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3419>sepulcher<s%> at the <S%G393>rising<s%> of the <S%G2246>sun.<s%>

And they <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> shall <S%G617>roll<s%> us <S%G617>away<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> from the <S%G2374>door<s%> of the <S%G3419>sepulcher?<s%>
And when they <S%G308>looked,<s%> they <S%G2334>saw<s%> that the <S%G3037>stone<s%> was <S%G617>rolled<s%> <S%G617>away:<s%> for it was <S%G4970>very<s%> <S%G3173>great.<s%>

And <S%G1525>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3419>sepulcher,<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>side,<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in a long <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G4749>garment;<s%> and they were <S%G1568>affrighted.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Be not <S%G1568>affrighted:<s%> You <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified:<s%> he is <S%G1453>risen;<s%> he is not <S%G5602>here:<s%> <S%G2396>behold<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> they <S%G5087>laid<s%> him.

But <S%G5217>go<s%> your way, <S%G2036>tell<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and <S%G4074>Peter<s%> that he <S%G4254>goes<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> you <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee:<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall you <S%G3700>see<s%> him, as he <S%G2036>said<s%> to you.

And they <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G5035>quickly,<s%> and <S%G5343>fled<s%> from the <S%G3419>sepulcher;<s%> for they <S%G2192>trembled<s%> <S%G5156><s%> and were <S%G1611>amazed:<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> they <S%G3762>any<s%> thing to <S%G3762>any<s%> <S%G3762>man;<s%> for they were <S%G5399>afraid.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when Jesus was <S%G450>risen<s%> <S%G260>early<s%> <S%G4404><s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> he <S%G5316>appeared<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> to <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> out of <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1544>cast<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1140>devils.<s%>
And she <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> them that had <S%G1096>been<s%> with him, as they <S%G3996>mourned<s%> and <S%G2799>wept.<s%>
And they, when they had <S%G191>heard<s%> that he was <S%G2198>alive,<s%> and had been <S%G2300>seen<s%> of her, <S%G569>believed<s%> not.

<S%G3326>After<s%> that he <S%G5319>appeared<s%> in <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G3444>form<s%> to <S%G1417>two<s%> of them, as they <S%G4043>walked,<s%> and <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G68>country.<s%>
And they <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> it to the <S%G3062>residue:<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> they them.

<S%G5305>Afterward<s%> he <S%G5319>appeared<s%> to the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> as they <S%G345>sat<s%> <S%G345>at<s%> meat, and <S%G3679>upbraided<s%> them with their <S%G570>unbelief<s%> and <S%G4641>hardness<s%> of <S%G4641>heart,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G4100>believed<s%> not them which had <S%G2300>seen<s%> him after he was <S%G1453>risen.<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G4198>Go<s%> you <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G2784>preach<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> creature. <S%G2937><s%>
He that <S%G4100>believes<s%> and is <S%G907>baptized<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved;<s%> but he that <S%G569>believes<s%> not shall be damned. <S%G2632><s%>

And <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> shall <S%G3877>follow<s%> them that <S%G4100>believe;<s%> In my <S%G3686>name<s%> shall they <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>devils;<s%> they shall <S%G2980>speak<s%> with <S%G2537>new<s%> tongues; <S%G1100><s%>

They shall <S%G142>take<s%> up <S%G3789>serpents;<s%> and <S%G2579>if<s%> they <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2286>deadly<s%> thing, it shall not <S%G984>hurt<s%> them; they shall <S%G2007>lay<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G732>sick,<s%> and they shall recover. <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2573><s%>

<S%G3303>So<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to them, he was <S%G353>received<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And they <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G3837>every<s%> <S%G3837>where,<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4903>working<s%> with them, and <S%G950>confirming<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> with <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G1872>following.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
